item.title: Wikipedia Turkish Dataset Release
item.description: Hello, language enthusiasts! I am excited to announce the release of my personal side-project: the Wikipedia Turkish February 2023 dataset! This dataset is a comprehensive collection of articles from the Turkish Wikipedia, specifically designed for masked language modeling and text generation tasks. As a passionate advocate for the development and exploration of the Turkish language, I am thrilled to share this resource with the community. In this blog post, I’ll be giving you a brief overview of the dataset, its features, and how you can utilize it for your projects.
